scripts.publish: rm -rf publish/trunk/* publish/assets/*; rsync -av --exclude='assets' --exclude='.git' --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='composer.lock' --exclude='package.json' --exclude='package-lock.json' --exclude='.wp-env.json' --exclude='.gitignore' --exclude='phpcs.xml.dist' --exclude='publish' ./ publish/trunk/; rsync -av ./assets/ publish/assets/ --exclude='.DS_Store'
